field.label: Enable Bazaarvoice Extension
field.comment: Enable all Bazaarvoice Magento extension features at this Magento Scope

field.label: Client Name
field.comment: Client Name as defined in your BV platform account

field.label: Deployment Zone
field.comment: Default is "main_site". If using "Deployment Zones", enter the Deployment Zone Id defined in the Bazaarvoice Configuration Hub.

field.label: Locale
field.comment: The BV locale for this Magento Configuration Scope. For example: "en_US". The locale must be enabled within your BV platform account.

field.label: Enable Cloud SEO
field.comment: Turn on the BV SEO solution. This will include SEO-friendly content (located in the BV SEO cloud) in your product pages. See documentation for additional steps that must be completed for this feature to take effect.

field.label: Cloud SEO Key
field.comment: SEO Cloud key value as defined in your BV platform account. This key is only required if Cloud SEO is enabled.

field.label: Enable BV Pixel
field.comment: Turn on the BV Pixel on the purchase transaction (checkout) page. See documentation for additional steps that must be completed for this feature to take effect.

field.label: Enable BV Product Families
field.comment: BV Product Families will be defined for visible Configurable and Simple product combinations

field.label: Debug
field.comment: Debug information can be found at bazaarvoice.log See documentation on how to use the bazaarvoice.log file to troubleshoot your implementation.

field.label: Enable Ratings & Reviews
field.comment: Turn on BV Ratings & Reviews. This will enable display of R&R content on your product pages. See documentation for additional steps that must be completed for this feature to take effect.

field.label: Use Submission Container Page
field.comment: The submission container page is used to collect reviews on mobile sites and to redirect users to the proper product page to see reviews. You must add these two paths into the Bazaarvoice Configuration Hub - STAGING URL: {staging site url}/bazaarvoice/submission/container PRODUCTION URL: {domain}/bazaarvoice/submission/container

field.label: Show Hidden Content for Reviews (BV.reviews.on)
field.comment: Some user actions cause Bazaarvoice features to come into view, such as clicking the ★★★★★ icons in the rating summary, which scrolls to ratings and reviews. If this content is hidden behind a tab, however, you must add custom, page-specific code that calls the bvCallback function to show the correct tab or container. See your Bazaarvoice Implementation manual for further information.

field.label: Filter Reviews on Configurable Product Selection
field.comment: If this feature is enabled, Bazaarvoice Content will display the entire Family unless a Configurable Child Product is selected. If a Child is selected, Reviews, Questions, and Summary will display only for its SKU.

field.label: Enable Hosted Inline Ratings
field.comment: This places a simple 1-5 out of 5 star rating wherever products are found on the site. Choose which pages you’d like this functionality to be seen. See Documentation on defining where stars can be added across the site.

field.label: Enable Questions & Answers
field.comment: Turn on BV Questions & Answers. This will enable display of Q&A content on your product pages. See documentation for additional steps that must be completed for this feature to take effect.

field.label: Show Hidden Content for Questions (BV.questions.on)
field.comment: Some user actions cause Bazaarvoice features to come into view, such as clicking the ★★★★★ icons in the rating summary, which scrolls to ratings and reviews. If this content is hidden behind a tab, however, you must add custom, page-specific code that calls the bvCallback function to show the correct tab or container. See your Bazaarvoice Implementation manual for further information.

field.label: Enable Dynamic Catalog Collection (DCC)
field.comment: Turn on Dynamic Catalog Collection (DCC). This sends product data to Bazaarvoice when each product detail page is visited. Either this or the Product Feed should be enabled, but not both.

field.label: Enable Product Feed
field.comment: Turn on Product Feed generation. This will enable generation of a product feed to be sent to the BV SFTP server. See documentation for additional steps to setup a scheduled job in Magento for this feature to take effect. Either this or DCC should be enabled, but not both.

field.label: Feed Generation Scope
field.comment: This determines whether separate feed files will be generated and sent to BV for each website, store or store view. Also used to determine the product and category prefixes, if they are enabled.

field.label: Enable Product Prefix
field.comment: If enabled, prefixes product ID and product name with the website/store group/store view code, depending on Feed Generation Scope. Should only be enabled for some Bazaarvoice accounts that are using multiple catalog sources.

field.label: Enable Category Prefix
field.comment: If enabled, prefixes category ID and category name with the website/store group/store view code, depending on Feed Generation Scope. Should only be enabled for some Bazaarvoice accounts that are using multiple catalog sources.

field.label: Cronjob Frequency (Minutes)
field.comment: This should be set to match the frequency you are running the system level Magento cron. The extension will populate the Bazaarvoice Product Feed Index for this many minutes in batches of 50 products.

field.label: SFTP Username
field.comment: SFTP Connection Username. If this is left blank, the above Client Name will be used.

field.label: SFTP Password
field.comment: Password used to access the BV SFTP server for feed upload/download processes. Note: this field is encrypted in v8.3.0+. If you recently upgraded and are experiencing connectivity issues, please try re-entering your password.

field.label: SFTP Host Name
field.comment: SFTP Connection Host.

field.label: Product Feed Filename
field.comment: If blank 'productfeed.xml' will be used.

field.label: Product Feed Export Path
field.comment: If blank '/import-inbox' will be used.

field.label: Brand Attribute
field.comment: This attribute code will be used to locate the brand of products which are sent in the product feed. Attribute must be set to 'Use in Product Listing.'

field.label: UPC Attribute
field.comment: This attribute code will be used to locate the UPC of products which are sent in the product feed. Attribute must be set to 'Use in Product Listing.'

field.label: EAN Attribute
field.comment: This attribute code will be used to locate the EAN of products which are sent in the product feed. Attribute must be set to 'Use in Product Listing.'

field.label: Manufacturer Part Number Attribute
field.comment: This attribute code will be used to locate the Manufacturer Part Number of products which are sent in the product feed. Attribute must be set to 'Use in Product Listing.'

field.label: ISBN Attribute
field.comment: This attribute code will be used to locate the ISBN of products which are sent in the product feed. Attribute must be set to 'Use in Product Listing.'

field.label: Model Number Attribute
field.comment: This attribute code will be used to locate the Model Number of products which are sent in the product feed. Attribute must be set to 'Use in Product Listing.'

field.label: Family Attributes
field.comment: If set, these attribute code(s) will be used in addition to the configurable product SKU to populate family data. Attribute must be set to 'Use in Product Listing' to display.

field.label: Expand Families in DCC/Product Feed
field.comment: Yes (Default) Setting to determine whether simple products show reviews and ratings for their entire product family.

field.label: Aggregate Custom Attributes
field.comment: Product Family Syndication: Please carefully read the documentation before enabling. This setting affects how reviews will display on syndicated sites and should only be used under certain circumstances.

field.label: Use category URL path as category id
field.comment: No (Default) If true, use Magento category URL path as category id, otherwise use Mage category entity primary key.

field.button_label: Run Enabled Bazaarvoice Product Feeds Now
Force Run All Bazaarvoice Product Feeds Now

field.label: Enable Purchase Feed
field.comment: Turn on Purchase Feed generation. This will enable generation of a purchase feed to be sent to the BV SFTP server to be used to send post-interaction emails to your customers in order to solicit review submission. See documentation for additional steps to setup a scheduled job for this feature to take effect. WARNING Do not enable in production until emails have been tested

field.label: Purchase Feed Lookback
field.comment: Number of days back to begin looking for orders.

field.label: Purchase Feed Triggering Event
field.comment: This determines whether to use the purchase date or ship date when calculating which purchases to include in the purchase feed.
WARNING Do not run in production until emails have been tested.
